oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Recreation tent for men at Marolles

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Men; Military personnel; Soldiers; Uniforms; Military uniforms; Tents; Campaigns & battles; War
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Three men in military uniform outside of a recreation tent for the 105th Engineers Regiment, 30th Infantry Division. A building in the background of the photograph has "Café Armes Cycles Machines A Coudre" painted across the top.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Warfield, Francis B.
